name: Young Sea Dragon
description: The Young Sea Dragon is a large dragon that embodies the essence of aquatic life, characterized by its impressive build, natural armor, and striking appearance.
memorable: Known for its powerful Tidal Breath and ability to deal significant damage to structures, the Young Sea Dragon is a force to be reckoned with in both water and air.
goals: Typically seeks to control aquatic territories and prey upon weaker beings, often engaging in territorial disputes.
relations: Can be encountered with other aquatic creatures and may serve a larger dragon or hide in a lair near water.
environment: Primarily found in oceans, seas, and coastal areas, thriving both underwater and airborne.
strengths: Possesses cold damage immunity, exceptional physical strength, and resilience against spells due to high saving throw proficiencies.
weaknesses: Average dexterity may limit its agility in combat.
attacks: Can perform a multiattack with a powerful Bite and slashing Fin attacks, dealing high piercing and cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: Tidal Breath allows it to unleash a wave of icy seawater, dealing massive damage and controlling the battlefield.
senses: Has blindsight up to 30 feet, enhancing its ability to sense movement in water.
skills: Possesses a high perception skill of +9, allowing it to detect foes effectively in various environments.
additional_information: Can breathe both air and water.
Deals double damage to objects and structures.
Utilizes a mix of melee and breath attacks.
Strikes a balance between air and aquatic combat abilities.
test_queries: large dragon that breathes icy seawater
formidable aquatic dragon with cold immunity
dragon that can attack both in air and water
creature with a tidal wave ability
powerful dragon with double damage to structures
